name: homefront
description: Boilerplate for a static website, with kilograms of js deps

scripts.preinstall: if [ ! -d venv ] ; then python -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && python setup.py develop; fi ; if [ ! -d festune_data ] ; then npm run-script festune-login ; fi
scripts.install: npm run-script css && npm run-script js && npm run-script html
scripts.html: npm run-script html-update && npm run-script html-compile && npm run-script html-minify
scripts.html-update: if [ ! -d output/t ] ; then git submodule update --init ; else  cd output/t && git reset --hard && git clean -fxd && git pull origin master; fi
scripts.html-minify: bash -c 'shopt -s globstar ; for f in output/**/*.html; do if [ -s $f ] ; then echo "minifying $f" ; npx html-minifier -c html-minifier.json $f > $f.min && mv $f.min $f; fi ; done'
scripts.css: npm run-script css-compile && npm run-script css-prefix && npm run-script css-minify
scripts.css-compile: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-package-importer/dist/cli.js --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 theme/default/scss/styles.scss output/theme/css/styles.css

author: Martin Richard
